thread.title: Detroit 4, Toronto 0: Near perfect night in Wings' opener
thread.title_full: Detroit 4, Toronto 0: Near perfect night in Wings' opener

title: Detroit 4, Toronto 0: Near perfect night in Wings' opener
text: Red Wings forward Brad Richards, center, loses his helmet during a scrum in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin starts to celebrates his second period goal during the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings defenseman Mike Green watches Dylan Larkin's second period goal get by Maple Leafs goalie Jonathan Bernier during the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin gets high-fives form players on the bench after his second period goal during the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Justin Abdelkader scores his third goal of the game in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen (From left) Red Wings Mike Green, Henrik Zetterberg and Dylan Larkin, right, congratulate Justin Abdelkader, right center, after his third goal of the game and a 4-0 Wings's lead during the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Maple Leafs coach Mike Babcock on the bench in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings defenseman Mike Green takes a hard check from the Maple Leafs' Brad Boyes in back of the Wings' goal in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen Red Wings defenseman Niklas Kronwall knocks the goal and the Maple Leafs' Joffrey Lupul over as he clears the puck behind Wings' goalie Jimmy Howard in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Drew Miller knocks the Maple Leafs' Martin Marincin off his skates going after the puck behind the Leafs' goal in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin works to get around the Maple Leafs' Matt Hunwick going after the puck in back of the Leafs' goal in the first period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin gets a hug from equipment manager Paul Boyer after Larkin scored his first NHL goal in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin takes a hit from the Maple Leafs' Scott Harrington in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard makes a deflection save as the Maple Leafs' James van Riemsdyk skates in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard takes a hard hit as the Maple Leafs' Daniel Winnik gets tangled up with Wings' defenseman Brendan Smith, right, in the second period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings coach Jeff Blashill on the bench in the third period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen (From top) Red Wings Gustav Nyquist, Brad Richards and Tomas Tatar setup to take a face off against the Maple Leafs' James van Riemsdyk, Tyler Bozak and Leo Komarov in the third period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen Red Wings forwards Dylan Larkin, left, and Henrik Zetterberg keep the puck away from the Maple Leafs' Morgan Rielly, right, in the back of the Leaf's goal in the third period of the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Maple Leafs coach Mike Babcock follows his last player, Leo Komarov, off the ice after the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard acknowledges the crowd's applause as he is announced as the third star of the game after the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin acknowledges the crowds applause as he is announced as the second star of the game after the Wings' 4-0 win over the Maple Leafs Friday at Joe Louis Arena. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Al Sobotka twirls the first Octopus of the season thrown during the National Anthem before the Red Wings season opening hockey game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fullscreen Two fans both from Toronto, Natalie Guest, left, a Maple Leafs fan with her boyfriend, Mitchell Chudziak, a lifelong Red Wings fan, wait for the doors to open to Joe Louis Arena for the Red Wings' season opening game against the Toronto Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fans are lineup a half hour before the doors opened to Joe Louis Arena for the Red Wings' season opening game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings and Maple Leafs fans stream into the Gordie Howe entrance to Joe Louis Arena for the Wings' season opening game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP George Bresinsk, a volunteer for three years at Joe Louis Arena, hands out free programs to fans as they enter the Gordie Howe entrance for the Red Wings season opening game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings fan Debbie Nida, 58 from Monroe, has had her Octopus decorated Wings hat for 10 years as she walks through the Joe Louis Arena concourse before the Wings season opening game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Fans crowd into one of the Joe Louis Arena souvenir shops before the Red Wings' season opening game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings goalie Petr Mrazek comes out during player introduction before their hockey game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard comes out during player introduction before their hockey game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings Pavel Datsyuk comes out during player introduction before their hockey game against the Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings players line up during player introduction before their hockey game against the Toronto Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Henrik Zetterberg hugs Justin Abdelkader after his first goal against Maple Leafs goalie Jonathan Bernier in the first period on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Justin Abdelkader, back right, watches his second goal of the first period get by Maple Leafs goalie Jonathan Bernier for a 2-0 Wings lead on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Justin Abdelkader, left, celebrates his second goal of the first period with Henrik Zetterberg and Jakub Kindl, right, for a 2-0 lead over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Dylan Larkin brings the puck behind the Maple Leafs gaol and past Dion Phaneuf on the first period on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Red Wings forward Justin Abdelkader gtes checked into the glass by the Maple Leafs' Matt Hunwick in the first period on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Maple Leafs head coach Mike Babcock on the bench in the first period of their hockey game against the Red Wings on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP The tribute on the sceaobord in the first period for former Red Wings and now Maple Leafs coach Mike Babcock during their hockey game on Friday. Julian H. Gonzalez DFP Former Red Wings coach and now Maple Leafs coach Mike Babcock acknowledges the applause during a first period tribute to him darning the Wings Maple leafs hockey game on Friday.
